text: Crin Antonescu (b. 21 September 1959, Tulcea) is a Romanian liberal politician. Antonescu was the President of PNL but in 2014 quit the presidency and now is only a member of the party. On 3 July 2012, he was elected President of the Romanian Senate. In 2014 he resigned and was replaced by Călin Popescu-Tăriceanu ==References== Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Senate of Romania
title: Crin Antonescu
